text: Tete! is an album by pianist Tete Montoliu's Trio recorded in 1974 and released on the Danish label, SteepleChase.SteepleChase Records discography, accessed March 18, 2015Tete Montoliu discography, accessed March 18, 2015 ==Reception== Scott Yanow of AllMusic called it "a typically excellent date.". ==Track listing== # "Giant Steps" (John Coltrane) - 6:31 # "Theme for Ernie" (Fred Lacey) - 7:14 # "Body and Soul" (Frank Eyton, Johnny Green, Edward Heyman, Robert Sour) - 12:22 # "Solar" (Miles Davis) - 7:00 # "I Remember Clifford" (Benny Golson) - 8:26 # "Hot House" (Tadd Dameron) - 7:00 ==Personnel== *Tete Montoliu – piano *Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen - bass *Albert Heath - drums ==References== Category:Tete Montoliu albums Category:1975 albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums
title: Tete!
